title: Live stream murder plot foiled
text:
Email a friend 
A MAN allegedly threatened to kill a former porn actor, who now performs on webcams, and live stream himself 'opening fire’ on her on app Periscope. 
Brian Blakenship, who used the online moniker ‘Joe Cook’ and ‘@BrianFalcons48’, said on Periscope that he would live-stream the killing of Malena Morgan — real name Carly Morrison — in the same way WDBJ-TV reporter Alison Parker and cameraman Adam Ward were murdered during a live interview in Moneta in the US State of Virginia in August, the Ledger-Enquirer reported . 
Blankenship, 25, of Columbus, Georgia , emailed Morgan, stating: “When you walk out of your house and see me it will be too late ... your next periscope will be your bloody head on a stick ... bank on it bitch,” court documents stated . 
He also wrote in an email: “I hope you have protection Carly Morrison I have a 9mm and a shotgun ... you’re dead bitch and you won’t see me coming ... periscope you’re undoing it’s raw and I will take my own life after your life is gone.” Brian Blankenship allegedly said on Periscope that he would live stream his murder of porn star Malena Morgan. Picture: Muscogee County Jail Source: Supplied Nude webcam model Malena Morgan reported Brian Blankenship's abusive and threatening emails and the FBI tracked him down. Picture: malenamorgan / Instagram Source: Instagram 
Blakenship was tracked down by the FBI after complaints from Morgan, who has nearly 140,000 Twitter followers and almost 89,000 followers on Instagram. She forwarded 12 emails to the FBI. 
Blakenship was confronted by his employer, Publix Super Market, on October 8 after the company had received online complaints regarding a video post threatening to kill Morgan. He allegedly admitted the claims were true. 
He was also interviewed by the FBI on the same date, where he allegedly also confessed to sending multiple threatening emails and posting threatening videos on Periscope to Morgan. 
Police interviewed Blakenship’s parents Brian and Mitzi. His mother claimed that her son had threatened to kill every member of the family and that she was fearful of him. A loaded .380 semiautomatic pistol was found in the home. 
Blankenship was later that day charged with transmitting in interstate commerce a communication threatening to injure an identified individual. He appeared in court in Columbus on Friday, where he pleaded not guilty. 
Morgan, 24, began modelling when aged 13, IMDB states . She appeared in hard porn movies, and was Penthouse Pet of the Month in November 2011. She has been on the cover of several porn magazines. 
She told the Ledger-Enquirer that she had retired from appearing in porn films in 2013. On her Instagram page, she calls herself a photographer, model and brand ambassador. She still strips naked on webcams.
